tool_description: Finds suitable alternative products when original routine items are unavailable, discontinued, or need replacement due to budget or preference changes.

product_function.description: Primary function: cleanser, moisturizer, serum, sunscreen, treatment, toner, exfoliant

key_ingredients.description: Key ingredients to maintain or avoid

budget_range.description: Budget category: budget, mid_range, premium, luxury

skin_type.description: Skin type: dry, oily, combination, sensitive, normal

error_messages: Invalid product function: Use cleanser, moisturizer, serum, sunscreen, treatment, toner, or exfoliant
Invalid budget range: Use budget, mid_range, premium, or luxury
Invalid skin type: Use dry, oily, combination, sensitive, or normal
Missing key ingredients: Provide at least 1 key ingredient to match
Too many ingredients: Maximum 8 key ingredients for matching
usage: Specify the original product, its function, key ingredients, budget range, and skin type. Tool finds suitable alternatives with similar benefits.
